amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 117 of division C which prohibits funds for a new Proposed Outer Continental Shelf Oil and Gas Leasing Program and Notice of Intent to Prepare a Programmatic Environmental Impact Statement Plan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 158 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to strike section 117 of division C which prohibits funds for a new Proposed Outer Continental Shelf Oil and Gas Leasing Program and Notice of Intent to Prepare a Programmatic Environmental Impact Statement Plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 239 (Roll no. 387).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 239 (Roll no. 387).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. Graves (LA).
